name: prometheus
description: Prometheus is a leading open-source system monitoring and alerting toolkit. It collects metrics via pull-based scraping, stores them efficiently, and uses PromQL for powerful queries and visualizations.
features: Metric collection: Scrape metrics from instrumented applications and infrastructure using pull-based model.
Time-series database: Store metrics efficiently with compression and retention policies for long-term data.
PromQL queries: Write powerful queries using PromQL to analyze and aggregate metric data.
Service discovery: Automatically discover and monitor targets using Kubernetes, Consul, and other integrations.
Alerting rules: Define alert conditions that trigger notifications when thresholds are exceeded.
Multi-dimensional data: Label metrics with key-value pairs for flexible filtering and aggregation.
Visualization: Built-in expression browser and integration with Grafana for creating dashboards.
Federation: Aggregate metrics from multiple Prometheus servers for centralized monitoring.
Exporters: Collect metrics from third-party systems using hundreds of community-maintained exporters.
High availability: Deploy multiple Prometheus instances for redundancy and reliability.
Recording rules: Pre-compute expensive queries and store results for faster dashboard loading.
API access: Query metrics programmatically using HTTP API for custom integrations and automation.
